actions.recommendation: You need to have screening Mammogram&Colonosopy done - please see referrals sent to you
eGFR was on the lower end of normal - please repeat your kidney testing in 3/12 with a urine protein:creatinine ratio at the same time
Your BP&cholesterol was raised - lifestyle changes that we spoke about is VERY important. If still raised in 6/12 - to start medication. Add Omega 3 to your supplements.
Dietician&Biokineticist - we need to get you moving again&eating better - this will help you loose weight, help with energy, improve mood, sleep&decrease cholesterol&BP.
You need to have screening Mammogram&Colonosopy done - please see referrals sent to you
